remarks: The values of a finite real sequence have an upper bound.  (Contributed by NM, 19-Sep-2005.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2015.)
statement:
fsequb $p |- ( A. k e. ( M ... N ) ( F ` k ) e. RR -> E. x e. RR A. k e. ( M ... N ) ( F ` k ) < x ) $.
$d F k x $.
$d M k x $.
$d N k x $.
